name: Ruins of Alabard
description:
Alabard is a forgotten city in the skies. All that's left are its ruins.

In this multiplayer, online game, players need to cross the Alabard city scenario, winning the obstacle race and reaching the end of the city. 

Unlock new characters and skins with your victories and become the champion of Alabard.


Ruins of Alabard team:
Fernanda Menoli
Rafael Lopes
Victor Nunes
Guilherme Marques
Vinícius Montarroyos
